# Update magic
# Read
dd if=/dev/mmcblk0 skip=258544 count=16 bs=1
# Write
echo -n "abcdefghhgfedcba" | dd of=/dev/mmcblk0 seek=258544 count=16 bs=1

# Bootmode var
# Read
dd if=/dev/mmcblk0 bs=512 skip=512 count=1
# Set MAIN
echo -n "" | base64 -d | dd of=/dev/mmcblk0 bs=512 seek=512
# Set DIAGS
echo -n "" | base64 -d | dd of=/dev/mmcblk0 bs=512 seek=512

# PCBSN (board_id)
# Read
dd if=/dev/mmcblk0 bs=1 count=16 skip=258144
# Write
echo -n "00614011214201A0" | dd of=/dev/mmcblk0 bs=1 seek=258144

# Serial number
# Read
dd if=/dev/mmcblk0 bs=1 count=20 skip=258048
# Write
echo -n "B01114082142063E" | dd of=/dev/mmcblk0 bs=1 seek=258048

# MAC address
# Read
dd if=/dev/mmcblk0 bs=1 count=12 skip=258096
# Write
echo -n "4624A594AFFA" | dd of=/dev/mmcblk0 bs=1 seek=258096
